message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and contribute greatly to your success. Given its immense value to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $1,200,000 for this exceptional item. This price reflects the significant savings compared to its market value of $1,500,000, making it an attractive opportunity for you. Should you choose to accept this offer, I assure you of a seamless transaction and dedicated support throughout the process. Please let me know your decision within the next 48 hours so we can proceed accordingly. Looking forward to your positive response.
